# your code goes here
t = int(raw_input())

for X in range(t):
	n = int(raw_input())
	s = map(int, raw_input().split())
	#print s
	sum = 0
	for i in s:
		sum += i
	if(sum % n == 0):
		sum /= n
		count = 0
		for i in s:
			diff = sum - i
			if diff < 0:
				count -= diff
			else:
				count += diff
		print count
	else:
		print -1
